price: 54. Alobaki: Bozali kopesa ngai (sango eye) mpe boyebi malamu ete kibopaka esili kozua ngai, boye sango malamu nini bozali kopesa ngai?
arabic: قَالَ أَبَشَّرۡتُمُونِي عَلَىٰٓ أَن مَّسَّنِيَ ٱلۡكِبَرُ فَبِمَ تُبَشِّرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla abashartumūnī ʿalā an massaniya al-kibaru fabima tubashirūna
translations: Do you give me glad tidings
Do you give me glad tidings
